<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;setCallingConv(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4ca7c23dce1e95fc36e9d2c168f9e036cc7">CallingConv::AArch64&#95;SME&#95;ABI&#95;Support&#95;Routines&#95;PreserveMost&#95;From&#95;X0</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A save to TPIDR2 should be followed by clearing TPIDR2&#95;EL0.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;WriteIntr =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(M, Intrinsic::aarch64&#95;sme&#95;set&#95;tpidr2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab086c5b9f9563eda0cdd703f454e041e">CreateCall</a>(WriteIntr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a21075305f0e463b24aafc2fb99514ace">getFunctionType</a>(), WriteIntr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">                     Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73f286a780fbb8c82c0a8574540719ea">getInt64</a>(0));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This function generates code at the beginning and end of a function marked</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with either &#96;aarch64&#95;new&#95;za&#96; or &#96;aarch64&#95;new&#95;zt0&#96;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">/// At the beginning of the function, the following code is generated:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Commit lazy-save if active   &#91;Private-ZA Interface&#42;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Enable PSTATE.ZA             &#91;Private-ZA Interface&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Zero ZA                      &#91;Has New ZA State&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - Zero ZT0                     &#91;Has New ZT0 State&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; A function with new ZT0 state will not change ZA, so committing the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lazy-save is not strictly necessary. However, the lazy-save mechanism</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">/// may be active on entry to the function, with PSTATE.ZA set to 1 If</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the new ZT0 function calls a function that does not share ZT0, we will</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// need to conditionally SMSTOP ZA before the call, setting PSTATE.ZA to 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For this reason, it&#39;s easier to always commit the lazy-save at the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// beginning of the function regardless of whether it has ZA state.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">/// At the end of the function, PSTATE.ZA is disabled if the function has a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Private-ZA Interface. A function is considered to have a Private-ZA</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// interface if it does not share ZA or ZT0.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SMEABI::updateNewStateFunctions(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smeattrs">SMEAttrs</a> FnAttrs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Context = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigBB = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getEntryBlock();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(&amp;OrigBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a63cfb2a0dae69153fd961eb335949caa">front</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Commit any active lazy-saves if this is a Private-ZA function. If the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value read from TPIDR2&#95;EL0 is not null on entry to the function then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the lazy-saving scheme is active and we should call &#95;&#95;arm&#95;tpidr2&#95;save</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to commit the lazy save.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FnAttrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smeattrs/#abee68000498a270e17c4979e748d96b7">hasPrivateZAInterface</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create the new blocks for reading TPIDR2&#95;EL0 &amp; enabling ZA state.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SaveBB = OrigBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a52c990590792c91dd20b6d45acebe359">splitBasicBlock</a>(OrigBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;save.za&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PreludeBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(Context, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;prelude&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, SaveBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Read TPIDR2&#95;EL0 in PreludeBB &amp; branch to SaveBB if not 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">    Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(PreludeBB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TPIDR2Intr =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;TPIDR2 = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab086c5b9f9563eda0cdd703f454e041e">CreateCall</a>(TPIDR2Intr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a21075305f0e463b24aafc2fb99514ace">getFunctionType</a>(), TPIDR2Intr,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-smeabipass-cpp-/smeabi/#aa765a5fc788410699fd070df2aa20319"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-smeabipass-cpp-/smeabi/#aa765a5fc788410699fd070df2aa20319">SMEABI::runOnFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
